name: Hi-Q Einstein
description:
Hi-Q Einstein is a classic peg solitaire game that sees you moving pegs around to get from one colour layout to another in as few moves as possible.

I was introduced to this game at the age of 7, when my dad brought it home from a business trip. I loved it, however it was lost when our basement flooded. Over the years, I would search the internet for information or a copy of the game but to no avail. Finally in June 2008 I was able to track down one copy (thanks mom!) and purchased it immediately. Since it was becoming clear that this game was on its way to obscurity, I decided to revive it and bring it to the internet via Flash and Newgrounds.com.  Now, because Flash is on its way out, I've made it available here for you for PC.

I HIGHLY advise that you read the instructions before playing for the first time to get max enjoyment from this title. I hope you enjoy it as much as I did!

Return to the Arcade!
